examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I WANT TO DESIGN FOR T SHIRTS. DO YOU PROVIDE THE T SHIRTS AS WELL?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I want to know what I am getting in lite plan.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Is it possible to autofill docs in Canva from a picklist or database?

I am a private chef and want to create a beautiful custom menu to present to my clients, but don't want to have to type and format each time.
Describe the problem: I WANT TO SEE MY DESIGNS What type of problem is it ?: Others

What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I DID A DESIGN AND APPEARED PUBLISHED. WOULD YOU LIKE TO KNOW IF THE INFORMATION THAT IS CONFIDENTIAL WAS DISCLOSED ON THE PLATFORM ??? LOOK FOR CONTACT ASAP ... ATT STEFÃNIA

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I wanted to understand the billing amount, my plan and other relevant details.

Please treat this as urgent
What type of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: IN CREATE DESIGN, THE OPTIONS THAT ARE TO CHOOSE FROM FACEBOOK DO NOT FIT THE CURRENT SIZE USED FACEBOOK

What type of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: Hello, I have a problem with the tickets, in particular the "frame stickers". Each time I insert one in my design, it is partially cut and this applies to all my creations. This is not the case for the other team members. Can you help me please? Thank you

What do you need help with ?: Hi! After trying a free version, I have found that I do not want to become a customer. I want the annual subscription that starts automatically on January 11, 2021 to be deleted. vh Magnus J. Grimnes mjg.gitarist (at) gmail.com

What kind of problem? : Other description of your question: I would like to ask about the current buy-one-get-four activities of the professional version. If family members want to use it together, will the content that I and my family individually design be stored separately? Or can they log in to their account? How about modifying my design?
What type of problem is it ?: Other Describe the problem: I DO NOT APPEAR ALL THE DESIGNS THAT YOU CREATE
What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I wanted to know the size of this tag

What kind of problem is it ?: Other Describe the problem: Hello..I am trying to create a children's notebook. On the 3rd page I want (and for the rest that will follow) I want to enter little squares so that at the end a math notebook comes out. My question is: where do I find those little squares? Could anyone help me, please ?? Thank you ..

What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: Hello, I would like to have access to my work but it is impossible, I do not have access to any tab once the design has been chosen. I also cannot take a screenshot. Because for that it is necessary to put on one of my creations and it is suddenly impossible for me to speak to you. Can you put an option so that we can send you a screenshot. Or an email address. Can you help me, best regards, MM Henry
What kind of problem? : Other describe your question: I want to make a banner, is there a size limit?
What do you need help with?: I want to either leave or choose a cheaper plan

What type of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: I HAVE CREATED THREE INFOGRAPHS AND I WANT TO GET THEM TOGETHER ON A POSTER NEXT TO THE OTHER ON THE SAME POSTER BUT I DON'T KNOW HOW TO DO IT
What type of problem is it ?: Other Describe the problem: Thank you for such an excellent application! Thanks for helping so many people who have no design software experience. Cheers

What type of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: It is a wonderful, creative, young, nostalgic app, etc. It depends on oneself. ..and that possibility is not offered much ... I want to continue learning ... Thanks Canva !!!

Describe your issue: please I need the design I used 4 days ago can I get it back :( I typed my information

What kind of problem?: Other
What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I WANT MY DESIGNS BACK PLEASE

What type of problem?: Backup Describe your problem: Hello, I am a student and I use canva very often to carry out various projects ... I have never had a problem until now since this morning I logged on to Canva I had all my designs, tonight I have nothing left, neither in the trash ... Can you fix my problem? Thank you
What type of problem?: Backup Describe your problem: Hello, My latest design is no longer able to register. Could you help me ? RIchard Leibovici
What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: HAVE YOU DELETED MY DESIGNS ALL THAT HAPPENED ?????

What problem are you having?: Hello, I wanted to take your pro plan at 107 € / year for 1 to 5 users. But when I want to try it out, it doesn't give me a choice, I can only take the 8-user formula. What should I do ? Sincerely, <NAME>
How can we help you ?: I don't want to be part of canva anymore
What kind of problem ?: Other Please describe your problem: I want to withdraw from my voluntary registration. I await an answer. thanks

Waarbij heb je hulp nodig?: Hi. I have been trying to contact your support team for over 3 months now. Such a terrible customer experience. I want to retrieve all the designs that I accidentally deleted before closing this PRO account. Please HELP ME! I have another paid plan with <EMAIL> which is where we could store the designs. I've already went through the steps of sending you screenshots, designs and everything multiple times and get ZERO response after that. Please please help!? Thank you, <NAME>

What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: I cannot follow the tutorials because I do not have the same version. For example when I want to copy lines and refine them and when I zoom. This is causing me big problems. Please help me. I have Canva pro

Describe the issue: hi there,
i want to opt three months of subscription previously its showing that you are eligible for special offer but now when i want to subscribe its not showing that option. please help me to avail that offer.
What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: The design is awful. Much more complicated to use. Prefer the least updated version

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I want maximum size width 550, length 370
